game.name: Prism Warriors DX
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 카메라 움직임 조정, 색상 대체, 키보드 전용 옵션, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Prism Warriors return for another helping of retro-styled bullet hell action. Face off against the sinister Twilight Four, and fight to save more than just your friends...
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Prism Warriors return for another helping of retro-styled bullet hell action. Face off against the sinister Twilight Four, and fight to save more than just your friends...
